channel.title: 1. Pre-requisites on FortiGate auto-scale and AWS GWLB
channel.description: Recent content in 1. Pre-requisites on FortiGate auto-scale and AWS GWLB

item.title: 1.1 Demo Logistics
item.description: Accessing an AWS environment Warning This demo is for Fortinet employees only. To get the credentials, please access the CSE Americas International Sharepoint page. You will find the AWS credentials and login page.

item.title: 1.2 AWS Networking Concepts
item.description: Before diving into the reference architecture in this demo, let’s review core AWS networking concepts. AWS Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) is a logically isolated section of the AWS Cloud where you can launch AWS resources in a virtual network that you define. You have complete control over your virtual networking environment, including selection of your own IP address range, creation of subnets, and configuration of route tables and network gateways.
